page.title: 06Free time
page.content: {The Cliffs Bandstand In the Cliff Gardens, situated on Clifftown Parade, is the Bandstage where you can hear visiting bands. If the weather is alright there are tea dances held here too. In the morning they hold fun and games for children and it must not be missed on a relaxing sunny afternoon when music is being played. There are a few discos - one of them called Cinatras, on Hamlet Court Road, used to be the Queens Hotel. This place used to be used for pop concerts and shows. {The Cliffs} A walk through the Cliff gardens will give you a lot of pleasure. You can see the beautiful floral clock and the fountain and lovely flowers in Prittlewell Square. Written by Lucy Warren (11yrs)
